changes.description: First blueprint version ðŸŽ‰
Add support for IKEA E1744 SYMFONISK Rotary Remote.
Add support for IKEA E1812 Shortcut button and fix IKEA E1743 naming.
Update action mapping for IKEA E1744. If you're using this Hook with an IKEA E1744, please update the corresponding Controller blueprint as well.
Set minimum and maximum light brightness.
Specify the number of steps from minimum to maximum brightness for both short and long actions when controlling the light.
Allow forcing brightness to a specific value when turning on the light.
Add support for Philips Hue Dimmer switch.
Fix light color modes preventing configuration of automations with color temperature control.
Add smooth power on/off features.
By default the light now turns off when a brightness down command is received at minimum brightness. Disable the smooth power off feature to keep the previous behaviour.
Fix optional field names.
Remove unused variable and fix warnings for undefined variables in Home Assistant Core >=2021.4.0.
Add support for OSRAM SMART+ Switch Mini.
Add support for Philips Hue Smart Button.
Improve inputs documentation and organization.
Standardize blueprint structure and input naming across the collection.
Improve blueprint documentation.
ðŸŽ‰ Add support for alternate mappings.

Update controller names in the Controller Model input to match full controller names, prevent ambiguities and enable alternate mappings. After updating, reconfigure automations by selecting the correct controller name.
Fix remembering brightness level when turning on lights if the previous state had brightness unavailable.
Add secondary mapping for IKEA E1743 TRÃ…DFRI On/Off Switch & Dimmer.
Add support for IKEA E1766 TRÃ…DFRI Open/Close Remote.
Add support for IKEA E2001/E2002 STYRBAR Remote control.
Fix color mode automatic detection not working properly with color temperature lights.
Add "None" color mode to disable color control features.
Add support for Philips 929002398602 Hue Dimmer switch v2.
Add support for Xiaomi WXCJKG11LM, WXCJKG12LM, and WXCJKG13LM.
Add secondary mapping for IKEA E2001/E2002.
Add support for Xiaomi WXKG11LM.
Add support for SONOFF SNZB-01.

Migrate to Zigbee2MQTT MQTT Device Triggers. The `controller_entity` input is deprecated and `controller_device` is now mandatory. Remove `controller_entity` from your automation and configure `controller_device` with your controller device ID. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

Add support for Xiaomi WXKG01LM Mi Wireless Switch and rename Xiaomi WXKG11LM Aqara Wireless Switch Mini to Aqara WXKG11LM Wireless Mini Switch. Update the `controller_model` input accordingly if needed.
Use min_brightness and max_brightness as conditions instead of "while true" loops. (Thanks [@Nicolai-](https://github.com/Nicolai-))
Add support for IKEA E2201 RODRET Dimmer. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Add support for IKEA E2213 SOMRIG shortcut button. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Add support for IKEA E2123 SYMFONISK sound remote, gen 2. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Add support for Tuya ERS-10TZBVK-AA Smart knob. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
